hint: Focus on pushing filters early into explicit JOINs, isolate selective date dimension, and convert implicit joins to explicit CTEs for better predicate pushdown.
Isolate date and dimension filters into separate CTEs before joining, using explicit JOIN syntax and materializing filtered dimension sets.
Materialize all pre-filtered dimension and fact tables into CTEs, then join, potentially decomposing for early aggregation.
Transform IN-list to UNION/EXISTS, decompose MIN aggregates via subqueries, and use decorrelation with materialized CTEs for radical restructuring.
